faqs.answer: We offer monthly (₹199), quarterly (₹499), and yearly (₹999) subscription plans.
Sorry, we offer dont offer a free trial for  users.
To cancel your subscription, go to Settings > Subscription > Cancel Plan.
Refunds are only applicable within 24 hours of a subscription purchase.
You can stream on up to 1 devices  based on your plan.
No, you cant download content and watch offline using our app.
4K and Full HD content is available on supported plans and devices.
Your subscription renews automatically unless you cancel it before the renewal date.
Most content is available in multiple languages with subtitle support.
You can create up to 1 separate profile.
Enable Parental Controls from Settings to restrict mature content.
Try lowering the video quality or check your internet connection.
Visit the Home tab for the latest trending and recommended content.
You can reach us via chat or email support from the Help section in the app.
Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login screen to reset your password.
Use Chromecast or AirPlay to cast content to your Smart TV.
Click on the '+' or 'Add to Watchlist' button to save content for later.
We offer an ad-free experience on all premium plans.
Check your payment method or update your billing info in Account Settings.
Your last watched progress is saved. Go to 'Continue Watching' to resume.
Enter your gift code under Account > Redeem Voucher to apply the offer.
Streaming uses about 1GB/hour in SD, 3GB/hour in HD, and 7GB/hour in 4K.
Some content may not be available in your region due to licensing restrictions.
Change your password immediately and contact support for account recovery.
We accept UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and popular wallets.
Currently, we do not offer student discounts.
Go to Profile > Viewing History to clear specific titles from your list.
Your current plan has reached its screen limit. Upgrade for more access.
Check our 'Coming Soon' section for upcoming movies and shows.
To delete your account, go to Settings > Account > Delete Account.
